name: OCTUKITTY
description:
STORY

-----
Waking one day to an eerily quiet house Octav1us went from room to room seeking Squidges (the octopus), with no luck in the house she searched the garden. At the very bottom of the garden Octav1us found a strange door locked with a padlock that required 6 keys, grabbing the padlock Octav1us was suddenly teleported back to the bedroom.  
"Guess I'll have to find those keys then." she said.  

INFORMATION
----------
This game comes as a .TAP file, usable on the ZX Spectrum 48k (or 128k) home computer. If you don't have a ZX Spectrum, you can use an emulator like ZXSpin.

CONTROLS
--------
Keys for keyboard - Q,O,P and M to fire.
Joystick - Up jumps, Left goes left, Right goes right and Fire fires.

MISC
----
Squidges is Squishes alt. dimension cousin (OG fan creation, do not stealz /s)

V1.00
- Initial release (21/12/18)

------------
Created with Arcade Game Designer by Jonathan Cauldwell.
Music added with AGD Musicizer by David Saphier.

Music track is 'Autumn Colors' by Shiru
https://shiru.untergrund.net/music.shtml

OctuKitty is not an official product of 0ctav1usKitten and is purely a free fan creation by UltraNarwhal.
